## Description {#details}

Expose <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopversioning">LoopVersioning</a> as a pass.

Currently this is only used for unit-testing. It adds all memchecks necessary to remove all may-aliasing array accesses from the loop.

Definition at line 150 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/loopversioning-h">LoopVersioning.h</a>.
